app_description: You don t need a translator by your side. From now on you will have it in your pocket. Translate.com App is a top notch translation service that will help you facilitate everyday communication translate texts documents interpret casual conversations and so much more. OUTSTANDING APP FEATURES: 94 languages available for translation 40 000 qualified experts ready to provide professional human translation services innovative interpreter mode unlimited text photo and voice translations simple and easy to navigate interface TEXT TO TEXT TRANSLATIONS Translate any text from 64 different languages within a second. Keyboard or handwriting input are available for your convenience. VOICE TO TEXT TRANSLATIONS Find a common language no matter where you are. Casual conversations will be interpreted in a blink of an eye. Your real time chit chat with a foreigner will be interpreted from 30 different languages. PHOTO TO TEXT TRANSLATIONS Image to text translations have never been faster and easier. Simply take a picture on your cell phone camera and this powerful app will instantly translate every single word on it. 17 languages available. HUMAN TRANSLATIONS Professional assistance of 40 000 accomplished translators are at your disposal. In case you need an impeccable translation our team of dedicated experts will work on any type of content to provide outstanding results. Languages supported by our app include: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Latin Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malay Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Cyrillic Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Swahili Swedish Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu Hmong Daw Klingon Serbian Latin .
